title: Difference in LP gains / losses?
body:
So I'm just wondering if anyone knows what's up about this:

I'm gaining around 25-27 lp per win and losing around 14-17 per loss, but my duo partner is gaining about 16 and losing about 16. We are the same rank and almost the same LP, what's the difference?

replies.body: You have different MMR even if you're the same rank.  LP gains/losses change to try and get your hidden MMR and visible rank as close to matching as possible.
